title: Integration with Cognitive Stimulation Activities
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that cognitive stimulation activities integrated into the ALFRED system comply with legal standards and maintain secure user data management, so that developers can create engaging, safe applications that promote cognitive health for older adults without compromising privacy.

title: API for Physical Activity Tracking Applications
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that the API for physical activity tracking applications meets regulatory compliance and security standards so that developers can build applications that protect user data and maintain legal integrity.

title: Customizable Cognitive Games Integration
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that customizable cognitive games comply with data privacy regulations so that they can be safely integrated into the ALFRED system without compromising user privacy.

title: Developer Tools for Activity Challenge Creation
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want robust developer tools that support the creation of activity challenges while ensuring compliance with data privacy standards so that we can enhance user engagement without compromising security.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Cognitive Activities
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that the feedback mechanisms for cognitive activities are designed with compliance in mind so that developers can create applications that maintain user privacy and adhere to regulatory standards.

title: Documentation for Physical Activity API Integration
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want detailed documentation for the Physical Activity API integration so that I can ensure compliance with legal requirements while enabling developers to create secure and user-friendly applications.

title: Real-Time Progress Tracking Integration
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want to ensure that real-time progress tracking for users is built into the ALFRED system so that developers can create health applications that maintain compliance while providing users with actionable insights into their physical and cognitive activities.

title: Activity Data Security Compliance
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want to ensure that all activity data managed within ALFRED is secured and compliant with data privacy regulations, so that developers can integrate applications without risking legal violations.
